cause.description:
Be sure to watch "Who Killed the Electric Car?" documentary. Brace yourself, it's quite depressing.
http://www.teslamotors.com/
http://www.zapworld.com/
http://www.phoenixmotorcars.com/
http://www.sonyclassics.com/whokilledtheelectriccar/
http://www.autobloggreen.com/2007/02/07/the-top-ten-electric-vehicles-you-can-buy-today-for-the-most-pa/
1. Let's urge car companies to start the production of EV's.
2. EV's should be made available to all those interested regardless of SES.
cause.mission: Bring back the electric vehicle revolution that was once started but failed.
cause.name: Bring Back the Electric Vehicle
